title: Interview with Matt Pinkett & Mark Roberts
description: In this episode, Matthew interviews Matt Pinkett and Mark Roberts who are the authors of Boys Don't Try?: Rethinking Masculinity in Schools to discuss some of the reasons behind why boys are underachieving in certain aspects of education.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew interviews Matt Pinkett and Mark Roberts who are the authors of Boys Don't Try?: Rethinking Masculinity in Schools to discuss some of the reasons behind why boys are underachieving in certain aspects of education.
itunes:summary: In this episode, Matthew interviews Matt Pinkett and Mark Roberts who are the authors of Boys Don't Try?: Rethinking Masculinity in Schools to discuss some of the reasons behind why boys are underachieving in certain aspects of education.
